0.1.1.en: Improved modularity, with the goal of supporting multiple HVAC brands

0.2.1.en: Fix for mDNS entries with missing attributes

0.3.0.en: Capability reworks, code optimizations, MHI energy/power fixes, misc fixes

0.3.1.en: Fixes for MHI and missing measurements

0.3.2.en: Lower minimum temperatures to match with ClimateControl possibilities

0.4.0.en: Setting page for devices, polling_interval and temperature_step_size configurable

0.5.0.en: Added Remote Temperature set card/api method, fixed polling_interval setting
